name: Brück'n Stadl
description:
in the Brück'n Stadl in Mayrhofen in the Zillertal!

Our "Stadl" is opened in summer offering folk music events as well as in winter for everybody who wants to join a great party during Aprés Ski. Till 11 p.m. we serve our traditional tyrolean meals with a refreshing beer or a noble glass of wine.

Since 2010/2011 our "party hut" shows it's new face after a rebuild and it now is also present in a modern way on the internet channel facebook and also has it's own homepage on www.brueckenstadl.at.

Take a look, leave your comments in our guestbook, get in contact via facebook,...

If you have any questions - we are always on your disposal.

We look forward to see you again!

Yours family Schneeberger - Hotel Gasthof Brücke
